name: Coffee Ghost
description:
Blue and Misty had dreamed of opening a coffee shop together before they were ghosts. They purchased a dingy old coffee shop hoping to fulfill their wishes, but unfortunately it had burned down with them in it. Luckily even ghosts need coffee so their dream lives on, now they must use their unique skills in the afterlife to serve those in the temporary purgatory. The Roasted Soul is now open for business to serve those waiting to get into the afterlife!

This game is made for Game Dev ATLS 4140 at CU Boulder by Jake Henson, Colin Soguero, Ethan Choe, and Hai Li
